title: Vegas Heat
description: He's an assassin.She's his target.He's been given 72 hours to kill the woman he has fallen in love with. But she's not the only one with a target on her back.Quinn Slater has learned to fit in where needed. Just like he did in order to work side-by-side with Christy Axel, the woman he was sent to kill. When their company's CEO sends them to Las Vegas for a conference, the clock on Christy's life begins ticking. But everyone has secrets, and everyone has a past that will someday come back to haunt them.Vegas Heat is an erotic thriller with non-stop, heated action.The question is, can you figure out who the real killer is?
author: Quinn Slater
